price: 如果我使人尝试从我发出的慈恩，然后我把那慈恩夺取了，他必定失望而且辜恩。
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنَّا رَحۡمَةٗ ثُمَّ نَزَعۡنَٰهَا مِنۡهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٞ كَفُورٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnā al-insāna minnā raḥmatan thumma nazaʿnāhā min'hu innahu layaūsun kafūrun
